abstract: Lauren Tyler, JPMorgan’s head of investor relations, will become chief auditor. Martha Gallo, meanwhile, was named the head of global compliance and regulatory management.
snippet: Lauren Tyler, JPMorgan’s head of investor relations, will become chief auditor. Martha Gallo, meanwhile, was named the head of global compliance and regulatory management.
lead_paragraph: After moving several members of his senior leadership team this summer, Jamie Dimon, JPMorgan Chase‘s chairman and chief executive, has started to reshuffle the ranks a layer or so down.

headline.main: JPMorgan Names 2 Executives to New Posts
